DOC.detailed_description: For standardization , participant ask avoid excessive alcohol consumption ( 1 unit alcohol 8 pm night test day ) intense physical activity 48 hour prior test day . Also , ask consume standardized meal home later 8 pm night test day . This meal prepare deliver department . Furthermore , participant must arrive study facility morning overnight fast ( 10 pm ) use non strenuous mean transportation . Over course study ( screen ( visit 1 ) completion last test day ( visit 5 ) ) , participant allow change body weight ( ±3 kg ) , diet physical activity level ( judged sub-investigator ) .
